content.text: I love to ride my bike, it's so relaxing. What about you?
I love practicing my guitar, I want to make it big in the local music scene!
That's really cool! Do you have any original songs?
Yes, I have a few that I'm working on right now.
I'd love to hear them sometime!
Maybe I can play them for you next time we hang out.
What are you up to this weekend?
I have to study for my nursing exam, but I'm looking forward to relaxing outside with my friends after I'm finished.
That sounds like a good plan. I have to study for my upcoming exams too.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
